Create Bitcoin indicators for trading.


Set options and load packages
```{r}
options(scipen = 999, digits = 4)

library(tidyverse)
library(tseries)
library(quantmod)
```



Using Quantmod

```{r}
getSymbols("BTC-USD", from='2016-10-27', to='2021-10-27')
BTC <- na.omit(`BTC-USD`)

getSymbols("ETH-USD", from='2016-10-27', to='2021-10-27')
ETH <- na.omit(`ETH-USD`)

getSymbols("HAS", from='2016-10-27', to='2021-10-27')
getSymbols("T", from='2016-10-27', to='2021-10-27')
getSymbols("DKNG", from='2016-10-27', to='2021-10-27')
getSymbols("PLTR", from='2016-10-27', to='2021-10-27')
getSymbols("ED", from='2016-10-27', to='2021-10-27')
```


Run the following code in the console:




chartSeries(PLTR,
            subset='last 18 months',
            theme=chartTheme('white')
            )
addEMA(n=3,on=1,col = "blue")
addEMA(n=15,on=1,col = "red")
addBBands(n=30,sd=2)
addMACD(fast=12,slow=26,signal=9,type="EMA")
